pageTitle: 9 Oracle Streams AQ Administrative Interface: Views
textBeforeTable: Table 9-17 DBA_ATTRIBUTE_TRANSFORMATIONS View Displays the transformation functions for all the transformations in the database. Purpose DBA_ATTRIBUTE_TRANSFORMATIONS Name of View All Transformation Functions View Target type name - VARCHAR2(91) TO_TYPE Source type name - VARCHAR2(61) FROM_TYPE Transformation name NOT NULL VARCHAR2(30) NAME Owning user of the transformation NOT NULL VARCHAR2(30) OWNER Unique ID for the transformation NOT NULL NUMBER TRANSFORMATION_ID Description NULL Datatype Column
textAfterTable: User Transformations View Name of View USER_TRANSFORMATIONS Purpose Displays all the transformations owned by the user. To view the transformation definition, query USER_ATTRIBUTE_TRANSFORMATIONS. Table 9-18 USER_TRANSFORMATIONS View Column Datatype NULL Description TRANSFORMATION_ID NUMBER NOT NULL Unique ID for the transformation NAME VARCHAR2(30) NOT NULL Transformation name FROM_TYPE VARCHAR2(61) - Source type name TO_TYPE VARCHAR2(91)
